## IEngine interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Abstraction of PrimitiveEngine.sol smart contract.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IEngine 
```

## Remarks

Implements immutable state variables as static methods.

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [factory](./rmm-sdk.iengine.factory.md) | string | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Primitive Factory address. Should be deployer of this instantiated Engine. |
|  [MIN\_LIQUIDITY](./rmm-sdk.iengine.min_liquidity.md) | number | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Minimum amount of liquidity of every pool. |
|  [risky](./rmm-sdk.iengine.risky.md) | Token | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Risky token class entity. |
|  [scaleFactorRisky](./rmm-sdk.iengine.scalefactorrisky.md) | Wei | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Multiplier to scale risky token amounts to the base <code>PRECISION</code>. |
|  [scaleFactorStable](./rmm-sdk.iengine.scalefactorstable.md) | Wei | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Multiplier to scale stable token amounts to the base <code>PRECISION</code>. |
|  [stable](./rmm-sdk.iengine.stable.md) | Token | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Stable token class entity. |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [involvesToken(token)](./rmm-sdk.iengine.involvestoken.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Checks to see if <code>token</code> is a token of this Engine. |
